text: “Nena (kwa Amushirikina): “Mpempheni Allah, m’dzina la Allah kapena mpempheni m’dzina la Rahman; (dzina) lililonse, limene mungamtchulire (zithandizabe); Iye ali nawo maina abwino. Ndipo usawerenge (Qur’an) pa Swala yako ndi mawu okweza, ndiponso usatsitse mawu kwambiri, koma tsata njira yolingana pakati pa zimenezo (pokweza kwambiri kapena kutsitsa zedi).”
